channel.title: [508] several questions [508]
channel.description:
Does anyone know the gfx/emote for the d claws special on a 508 server? And how do you make it so DFS (dragonfire shield)can use its spec on a 508? also how could you make it so a when i player clicks use on visage and then clicks on a anti-dragon shield it turns into a dragonfire shield
thanks
- pure2ownage

item.title: [508] several questions [508]

@N0vlafe wrote:

this isn’t no 317 u cant code a d claw into a 508 cuz runescape didn’t make d claw when they had a 508

And how do you make it so DFS (dragonfire shield)can use its spec on a 508?

it turns into a dragonfire shield

  • pure2ownage[/quote]

there arn’t d claws in 508 so they wont have gfx/emote for it, just use torag hammer, for the visage+anti drag shield=dfs going your itemonitem class, and for the dfs, you have to go into your actionbutton
